job.title: Systems Engineer III
job.industry: Medical Devices,Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Transforming smiles. Transforming lives. Transforming an industry.  At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.  Ready to join us? We are looking for an innovative candidate to be a key contributor as a Sr. Systems Engineer. The Sr. Systems Engineer provides technical expertise, direction and support to cross-functional teams, while guiding the design control processes of the Invisalign System and/or iTero products. This individual will be responsible for planning and executing projects that focus on new product development, as well as improving Align's existing products. Work is hands-on and cross-functional with other engineering groups, working in teams that solve varieties of exciting technical challenges.  The candidate will also support product development with a heavy focus on the design control of medical device processes, testing and documentation. This candidate will work closely with cross functional development teams to write, edit, review and finalize technical documents required for regulatory submissions of medical device products. Knowledge of testing and documents for pre-submissions, verification and validation protocols and reports is desired. Knowledge of US and European medical device documentation regulatory requirements (21 CFR 820.30 & ISO 13485) desired as well. BS/MS/Ph. D. in an engineering discipline  5+ years of experience in the medical device/pharmaceutical industry, familiar with medical device regulations and product development for medical devices.
